descriptionHtml:
[center]

[color=#ff7700][i][size=5][b]HOW TO INSTALL[/b][/size][/i][/color]
Download [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.html]latest version[/url] ENB files and copy the "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" to your [u]skyrim[/u] folder.

Copy the this ENB file to your [u]Skyrim[/u] folder.

Please edit SkyrimPrefs.ini
[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

Disable "Anti-Aliasing" and "Anisotropic filtering" in the SkyrimLauncher options.

Enable "TK_ENB_v0265a.esp".

Enjoy. This ENB is not compatible with CoT and RLO! I only support ELFX(without enhancer) and Relighting Skyrim.


[youtube]ujXhAkB2LeQ?vq=hd1080[/youtube]
Nice video by DJSpace bacon.


[color=#ff7700][size=5][i][b]What is TK ENB vXXX.esp?[/b][/i][/size][/color]
This plugin is based on NLA.esp.
It's a weather plugin.
I modified vanilla weathers for this ENB.
This esp is important and necessary.
Please enable this esp.

[i][color=#ff7700][size=5][b]PERMISSION[/b][/size][/color][/i]
I am using other author's assets.
You should not reuse this ENB without me and these authors permission.

Do not upload to Steam Workshop.

[i][color=#ff7700][b][size=5]Credit[/size][/b][/color][/i]
Please respect these authors and works!
ENB ... Boris Vorontsov ([url=http://enbdev.com/]http://enbdev.com/[/url])

Since v0265a, I am using FX files from prod80_([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62411/?]Serenity ENB _ ExtendedFX[/url])
Big thanks prod80_. His original FX files are great. Please check his works and try his ENB.
I have permission to distribute.

enbeffectprepass.fx ... kingeric1992 ([url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=3224]From ENB forum[/url])
I think this DOF has beautiful Bokeh.

TK ENB vXXX.esp ... This plugin is based on NLA.esp. I have permission to distribute.
NLA.esp is made by Confidence-Man ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065/?]Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB[/url])
Please also try NLA ENB! I really like NLA ENB. His work is amazing.
I think NLA is most beautiful ENB.

I am Japanese. I am not good at English.
I apologize if there are any mistakes in my English.

TK ENB Author ... tamu75 [url=http://s1925.blogspot.jp/]My blog[/url] (Language is Japanese)[/center]
author: tamu75
